org.ff4j.core

Interface FeatureStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFeatureStore, FeatureStoreAuditProxy, FF4jCacheProxy, InMemoryFeatureStore, JdbcFeatureStore, KeyValueFeatureStore

    public interface FeatureStore
    Repository to persist Feature(s)
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)

    • Method Summary

        Read all features within target group.
        Parameters:
        groupName - target group name
        Returns:
        return all feature from group or groupnotfoundException if does not exist

      • addToGroup

        void addToGroup(String featureId,
                String groupName)
        Add target Feature to target group.
        Parameters:
        featureId - target feature identifier
        groupName - target groupName

                     String groupName)
        Remove target Feature from group.

        featureId - target feature identifier
        groupName - target groupName

      • readAllGroups

        Set<String> readAllGroups()
        Return a set of existing groups.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Empty features set.

      • importFeatures

        void importFeatures(Collection<Feature> features)
        Import features.
        Parameters:
        features - list of features.s

      • createSchema

        void createSchema()
        Initialize the target database schema by creating expected structures.
      • TABLE, INDEX will be created for JDBC, but also COLLECTION and INDEXS for MongoDb, or COLUMN FAMILY for Cassandra.
      • The structures will be created only if they don't exist.
      • In some cases, there is nothing todo (Ehcache, Redis, InMemory), the method won't failed but do nothing (it does not clear the DB)
Since:
1.6
